title: Dalai Lama in Australia production
abstract: An audio visual recording of the visit to Australia in May 2002 by His Holiness the 14th Dalai Lama of Tibet
description: An audio visual recording of the following events as part of the visit to Australia in May 2002 by His Holiness the 14th Dalai Lama of Tibet:  4.00 pm Sunday 19th May 2002: Public Talk by Dalai Lama  8.30 am Monday 20th May 2002: Teaching by Dalai Lama: Atisha's, A Lamp to the Path to Enlightenment.  11.15 am Monday 20th May 2002: Victorian Secondary Schools Event with the Dalai Lama and Sigrid Thornton as MC. 5 Students will ask questions of the Dalai Lama.  2.00 pm Monday 20th May 2002: Teaching by the Dalai Lama: Atisha's Lamp to the Path to Enlightenment  9.30 am Tuesday 21st May 2002: Teaching by the Dalai Lama: Atisha's Lamp to the Path to Enlightenment  2.00 pm Tuesday 21st May 2002: Teaching by the Dalai Lama: Atisha's Lamp to the Path to Enlightenment  9.30 am Wednesday 22nd May 2002: Semkye and Chenrezig Jenang Empowerment by the Dalai Lama  2.00 pm Wednesday 22nd May 2002: Teaching by the Dalai Lama: Atisha's Lamp to the Path to Enlightement
related_objects: Collection; B1004277; Public Programs Collection; Active
